name: menu_card_1
description: Restaurant menu or food items | USE: restaurant menu, food menu, dish showcase, menu card, food items, restaurant pricing, dish prices, cuisine menu, food pricing, restaurant dishes | NOT: subscription plans, service pricing, product pricing, pricing tiers, SaaS pricing

samples.dish1_description: Fresh ingredients, wholesome flavors straight from Japan.
samples.dish2_description: Fresh ingredients, wholesome flavors straight from Japan.
samples.dish3_description: Fresh ingredients, wholesome flavors straight from Japan.

fieldPrompt.title_vertical: Enter the vertical title text (e.g., 'Japanese Soup')
fieldPrompt.background_color: Enter the main background color (hex, e.g., '#fff7ee')
fieldPrompt.title_color: Enter the accent color for the vertical title (hex)
fieldPrompt.menu_text_color: Enter the primary text color for descriptions (hex)
fieldPrompt.badge_color: Enter the fill color for the price badges (hex)
fieldPrompt.badge_text_color: Enter the text color for the price badges (hex)
fieldPrompt.cta_background_color: Enter the footer bar background color (hex)
fieldPrompt.badge_label_text: Enter the small label text displayed above each price (e.g., 'Only')
fieldPrompt.dish1_image_url: Enter the URL for dish 1 image
fieldPrompt.dish2_image_url: Enter the URL for dish 2 image
fieldPrompt.dish3_image_url: Enter the URL for dish 3 image
fieldPrompt.cta_label_left: Enter the left footer heading (e.g., 'Order Us Now')
fieldPrompt.cta_phone: Enter the phone number or CTA detail for the left footer column
fieldPrompt.cta_address: Enter the address or CTA detail for the right footer column
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter the URL for the logo image (PNG/SVG recommended)
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter the website URL to display in the header (e.g., 'www.reallygreatsite.com')

components.html_content:
${website_url}
${title_vertical}
${badge_label_text}${dish1_price}
${dish1_name}
${dish1_description}
${badge_label_text}${dish2_price}
${dish2_name}
${dish2_description}
${badge_label_text}${dish3_price}
${dish3_name}
${dish3_description}
${cta_label_left}
${cta_phone}
${cta_label_right}
${cta_address}
${custom_html}
